parameters: Lunaroa's dad
Oh, Laura-chan. You seem to be in a very good mood, huh?
Laura
\SM[nod]\SE[28]Ahaha... I got caught again.
Lunaroa's dad

We're thinking the same thing, huh. After all, it's been
five years, I've been looking forward to this.
Laura

\SE[1]I'd like to hear about the school too... If I had been
told in a letter, I would have been curious all this time.
Lunaroa's dad

Hehe... I also want to hear about it. However, for now, I'll
let Laura-chan have the privilege.
Laura
\SE[21]Thank you very much, Lunaroa's dad!
Laura
\SE[1]Hello, Luna Mama!
Lunaroa's mom

Yes, hello. You seem particularly energetic today. I wonder
if it's because Lunaroa is coming back?
Laura

\SE[28]Mom... Can you tell? I couldn't sleep much yesterday
because I was too excited... \!\SE[29]
Lunaroa's mom

Oh my, today I'm planning to make a special meal for that
child. If you'd like, Laura-chan, would you like to join us
as well?
Laura

\SE[14]...! I'll eat it! \|\SE[22]\SM[jump]Yay, my
excitement has increased!

events.name: ルナロア実家宛ての手紙

parameters:
This is a letter addressed to Lunaroa's parents. ... There
are traces of Lunaroa here that I don't know about. It's no
good... No... However...

This is Lunaroa's pillow. No, I can't take it. If I bring it
home, Luna will have to sleep without a pillow tomorrow...
...Would it be forgiven if I get into the futon?

Lunaroa used to read a book when she was a child. The
History of Denying the Geocentric Theory until the final
theorem was proven, spanning 300 years. The methodology of
chain reactions caused by atomic nuclei... It's as if I
don't understand the meaning at all.

Lunaroa used this notebook when she was a child. It is
filled with what looks like mathematical equations all the
way to the margins. It says that the margins ran out of
space. How cute.

Lunaroa likes the Cactus Flower. By having the role of
taking care of the flowers, I naturally have a reason to
enter this room.
